_sText:
This is the second released version of my ruins series.  

Nearly everything in this version is exact to fy_ruins_dawn, besides a few main differences.  The changes are as followed...

    * All weapons removed from map (For Gun Game compatibility)  -note below
    * 4 sets of grenades, (Flash, Smoke, HE) located at highest pillars/collumns.
    * Advanced Lighting (Map Compiled with -final for Better Lighting Quality)
    * Added a few more breakable objects into the map and repositioned some others.

And last,

    * Back again...   This version of ruins DOES CONTAIN the original scalable blocks that are triggered by buttons.  (SEE SHORT MOVIES BELOW FOR DETAILS)

Please let me know what you think.  I would also hope to get this map hosted on as many Gun Game servers out there as possible.  So if you have a server you are hosting this on, please let me know your server I.P. so I can stop by sometime!
